GOD.linkedContent: Unheimlichkeit of Geheimnis, both Freud & Heidegger: beyond an axiomatic of the self or the chez soi as ego cogito

GT.content: illusion of ethnographic theory (Lévi-Strauss)—like Freud’s “sexual theory” of children

FK.content: the reaction to radical evil at the heart of Freudian thought, interminable Jewish question [?]
FK.linkedContent: the reaction to radical evil at the heart of Freudian thought, interminable Jewish question [?]

MC.content: Lucretius’ clinamen related to voluptas is the pleasure principle
Freud: poets and artists anticipated and exceeded psychoanalysis
Freud trying to distinguish himself from the superstitious: different relation to future? no internal accidents? [same logic as the “letter always arrives”?]
MC.linkedContent: Freud trying to distinguish himself from the superstitious: different relation to future? no internal accidents? [same logic as the “letter always arrives”?]

MC.content: might the superstitious frame and contextualize even less than Freud?
MC.linkedContent: might the superstitious frame and contextualize even less than Freud?

MC.content: the superstitious “project psychology into the external world”
MC.linkedContent: the superstitious “project psychology into the external world”

MC.content: Freud’s name, proper name, a certain autobiography constitutive of the very structure of psychoanalysis
MC.linkedContent: Freud’s name, proper name, a certain autobiography constitutive of the very structure of psychoanalysis

MC.content: Freud seems to talk about Derrida’s dissemination, concept of drive, sublimation > is not [Freud’s] concept of drive, sublimation, the concept of bastardy?
MC.linkedContent: Freud seems to talk about Derrida’s dissemination, concept of drive, sublimation > is not [Freud’s] concept of drive, sublimation, the concept of bastardy?

AF.content: in Civilization & its Discontents, Freud does a captatio benevolentiae [re: diabolical death drive]: in the end I have nothing new to say, why archive this? would be pure loss (useless expenditure) [Derrida repeats gesture?] > radical perversion in this gesture: archive death drive as pure loss
AF.linkedContent: in Civilization & its Discontents, Freud does a captatio benevolentiae [re: diabolical death drive]: in the end I have nothing new to say, why archive this? would be pure loss (useless expenditure) [Derrida repeats gesture?] > radical perversion in this gesture: archive death drive as pure loss

AF.content: Freud’s Mystic Pad still participates in Cartesian space [FSW pp. 227-28] > do new archival machines (ones Freud could never dreamed of) change anything?
AF.linkedContent: Freud’s Mystic Pad still participates in Cartesian space [FSW pp. 227-28] > do new archival machines (ones Freud could never dreamed of) change anything?

AF.content: Freud’s 2 systems (Ucs & Pcs), 3 points of view (topic, dynamic, economic): that Freud integrates necessity of outside > prosthesis of the inside
AF.linkedContent: Freud’s 2 systems (Ucs & Pcs), 3 points of view (topic, dynamic, economic): that Freud integrates necessity of outside > prosthesis of the inside

AF.content: the 3 condensed meanings of word “impression”: 1. scriptural or typographic: mark on surface, on substrate, Freud’s Mystic Pad, difference btwn Verdrängung and Unterdrückung 2. “Freudian impression” of the archive, opposed to rigor of concept, “archive” only a notion [in psychoanlaysis], one not destined to some sin of nominalism but the possibility & future of the concept, very concept of the future 3. “Freudian impression” left by Sigmund Freud on himself, and on anyone who speaks about him, to be marked by Freud w/out knowing it
AF.linkedContent: the 3 condensed meanings of word “impression”: 1. scriptural or typographic: mark on surface, on substrate, Freud’s Mystic Pad, difference btwn Verdrängung and Unterdrückung 2. “Freudian impression” of the archive, opposed to rigor of concept, “archive” only a notion [in psychoanlaysis], one not destined to some sin of nominalism but the possibility & future of the concept, very concept of the future 3. “Freudian impression” left by Sigmund Freud on himself, and on anyone who speaks about him, to be marked by Freud w/out knowing it

AF.content: Freud’s 3 errors, the 1st: patriarchy marks triumph of reason/science over senses
AF.linkedContent: Freud’s 3 errors, the 1st: patriarchy marks triumph of reason/science over senses

AF.content: Freud makes a mistake in thinking only paternity is uncertain > maternity, as constructed as paternity [usual thought: mother real/ father figural],
AF.linkedContent: Freud makes a mistake in thinking only paternity is uncertain > maternity, as constructed as paternity [usual thought: mother real/ father figural],

AF.content: Freud both accounted for ghosts, and tried to conjure them like Marx: [re: Gradiva’s ghost] Freud speaks of “real ghost,” and of a part of truth, the truth of delusion, haunted by specter of truth, truth is spectral as part of truth irreducible by explanation
AF.linkedContent: Freud both accounted for ghosts, and tried to conjure them like Marx: [re: Gradiva’s ghost] Freud speaks of “real ghost,” and of a part of truth, the truth of delusion, haunted by specter of truth, truth is spectral as part of truth irreducible by explanation

AF.content: Freud made possible the idea of an archive with repression, subjective, hypomnesia, psychic spacing
AF.linkedContent: Freud made possible the idea of an archive with repression, subjective, hypomnesia, psychic spacing

AF.content: nearly ecstatic instant Freud dreams of [re: Studies on Hysteria]: origin speaking by itself, arkhē appears in the nude, w/out archive, anamnēsis w/out hypomnēsis
AF.linkedContent: nearly ecstatic instant Freud dreams of [re: Studies on Hysteria]: origin speaking by itself, arkhē appears in the nude, w/out archive, anamnēsis w/out hypomnēsis

AF.content: belief, radical phenomenon of believing, the only relationship possible to the other as other has no irreducible place in Freudian psychoanalysis: Freud thinks one ought not to believe in ghosts [?] > archeological outbidding of a return to reality
AF.linkedContent: belief, radical phenomenon of believing, the only relationship possible to the other as other has no irreducible place in Freudian psychoanalysis: Freud thinks one ought not to believe in ghosts [?] > archeological outbidding of a return to reality

AF.content: no one deconstructed authority of archontic principle better than Freud
AF.linkedContent: no one deconstructed authority of archontic principle better than Freud

AF.content: in Freud’s outbidding [see pp. 91-93 on 3 + 1 prostheses] wants to be an archivist more of an archaeologist than the archaeologist, exhume a  more archaic impression
AF.linkedContent: in Freud’s outbidding [see pp. 91-93 on 3 + 1 prostheses] wants to be an archivist more of an archaeologist than the archaeologist, exhume a more archaic impression

AF.content: we’ll always wonder what in this mal d’archive did Freud burn, what may have burned of his secret passions, w/out him, w/out name, w/out symptom, w/out knowledge, w/out even an ash
AF.linkedContent: we’ll always wonder what in this mal d’archive did Freud burn, what may have burned of his secret passions, w/out him, w/out name, w/out symptom, w/out knowledge, w/out even an ash

BL.content: Freud discovers repression as an answer to the question of the origin of moral law; man’s height, his 2 legs, creates repression, moral law
BL.linkedContent: Freud discovers repression as an answer to the question of the origin of moral law; man’s height, his 2 legs, creates repression, moral law

BL.content: quasi-event of the murder of father, event w/out event, resembles fiction, myth, fable > real, effective guilt; question of belief & historical referent—irremediably fissured
BL.linkedContent: quasi-event of the murder of father, event w/out event, resembles fiction, myth, fable > real, effective guilt; question of belief & historical referent—irremediably fissured

BL.content: dead father more powerful than living one
BL.linkedContent: dead father more powerful than living one

HASD.content: onto-theological, metaphysical presuppositions sustain psychoanalytic theorems

FSW.content: why Derrida hesitates to utilize Freud’s psychoanalytic concepts: belong to history of metaphysics, logocentric repression which excludes written trace, calls it servile, excrement
FSW.linkedContent: why Derrida hesitates to utilize Freud’s psychoanalytic concepts: belong to history of metaphysics, logocentric repression which excludes written trace, calls it servile, excrement

FSW.content: differance, pre-opening of ontic-ontological distinction, & of all the differences which furrow (sillonnant) Freudian conceptuality
FSW.linkedContent: differance, pre-opening of ontic-ontological distinction, & of all the differences which furrow (sillonnant) Freudian conceptuality

FSW.content: Freud never reflected on the precautions he takes, deconstruction will/does
FSW.linkedContent: Freud never reflected on the precautions he takes, deconstruction will/does

FSW.content: archi-trace, differance, neither Freudian nor Heideggerian concepts
FSW.linkedContent: archi-trace, differance, neither Freudian nor Heideggerian concepts

FSW.content: manipulate metaphors: 1) make the known an allusion to the unknown 2) making enigmatic through insistence of “metaphoric investment” > Freud does the latter
FSW.linkedContent: manipulate metaphors: 1) make the known an allusion to the unknown 2) making enigmatic through insistence of “metaphoric investment” > Freud does the latter

FSW.content: our reading will let metaphoric investment “invade the entirety of the psyche”
FSW.linkedContent: our reading will let metaphoric investment “invade the entirety of the psyche”

FSW.content: memory: essence of psyche for Freud > resistance, opening to effraction of trace
FSW.linkedContent: memory: essence of psyche for Freud > resistance, opening to effraction of trace

FSW.content: Freud [of Beyond…] complies w/ dual necessity: differance at origin, crossing-out concept primariness > delay is in the beginning
FSW.linkedContent: Freud [of Beyond…] complies w/ dual necessity: differance at origin, crossing-out concept primariness > delay is in the beginning

FSW.content: to speak of writing, to betray Freud more than ever
FSW.linkedContent: to speak of writing, to betray Freud more than ever

FSW.content: Freud’s theme that there is no purity to living present, formidable for metaphysics, found in a conceptual scheme unequal to the thing itself
FSW.linkedContent: Freud’s theme that there is no purity to living present, formidable for metaphysics, found in a conceptual scheme unequal to the thing itself

FSW.content: perhaps read Freud like Heidegger reads Kant: like cogito, the unconscious is timeless only via vulgar concept of time
FSW.linkedContent: perhaps read Freud like Heidegger reads Kant: like cogito, the unconscious is timeless only via vulgar concept of time

FSW.content: Freud privileging mneme to hypomnesis like in Phaedrus, like always > unlike Plato, psyche is caught up in an apparatus
FSW.linkedContent: Freud privileging mneme to hypomnesis like in Phaedrus, like always > unlike Plato, psyche is caught up in an apparatus

FSW.content: Freud augured a beyond and beneath of “Platonic” closure > by opening to theme of writing, writing as technē, as relation btwn life & death, btwn psychical and nonpsychical
FSW.linkedContent: Freud augured a beyond and beneath of “Platonic” closure > by opening to theme of writing, writing as technē, as relation btwn life & death, btwn psychical and nonpsychical

FSW.content: must extract Freud’s trace from metaphysics of presence it’s caught up in (particularly in concepts like perception, memory, unconscious, conscious, reality)
FSW.linkedContent: must extract Freud’s trace from metaphysics of presence it’s caught up in (particularly in concepts like perception, memory, unconscious, conscious, reality)

FSW.content: Freud performed for us the scene of writing > le discours de Freud y est pris
FSW.linkedContent: Freud performed for us the scene of writing > le discours de Freud y est pris

FSW.content: Derrida on fruitfulness of Freud’s radicalization of erasure of trace
FSW.linkedContent: Derrida on fruitfulness of Freud’s radicalization of erasure of trace

F.content: Derrida reverses Freud: Wo Ich war soll es werden [Wo Es war, soll Ich werden]
F.linkedContent: Derrida reverses Freud: Wo Ich war soll es werden [Wo Es war, soll Ich werden]

FWT.content: Freud’s 3 narcissistic wounds [inflicted on man’ ego]: Copernicus, Darwin, Freud
FWT.linkedContent: Freud’s 3 narcissistic wounds [inflicted on man’ ego]: Copernicus, Darwin, Freud

FWT.content: metapsychology—provisional weapon against philosophy of consciousness; all Freud’s machinery (id, ego, superego, ideal ego, ego ideal, etc.) will not hold up for very long
FWT.linkedContent: metapsychology—provisional weapon against philosophy of consciousness; all Freud’s machinery (id, ego, superego, ideal ego, ego ideal, etc.) will not hold up for very long

FWT.content: Derrida prefers breaches and openings in Freud; reaffirmation of a thought w/out alibi: no theological/humanist alibi in psychoanalysis (makes it so pitiless, so cruel); indispensable audacity of thought—courage; use of theoretical fictions [i.e. pleasure principle vs. death principle]
FWT.linkedContent: Derrida prefers breaches and openings in Freud; reaffirmation of a thought w/out alibi: no theological/humanist alibi in psychoanalysis (makes it so pitiless, so cruel); indispensable audacity of thought—courage; use of theoretical fictions [i.e. pleasure principle vs. death principle]

FWT.content: Freud’s grand entities (ego, id, etc.) & Lacan’s grand conceptual oppositions (real, imaginary, symbolic) are too solid, substantialized—differance erases/displaces their borders
FWT.linkedContent: Freud’s grand entities (ego, id, etc.) & Lacan’s grand conceptual oppositions (real, imaginary, symbolic) are too solid, substantialized—differance erases/displaces their borders

FWT.content: Freud helps us question tranquil assurances of responsibility
FWT.linkedContent: Freud helps us question tranquil assurances of responsibility

FWT.content: [re: murder of the father] Freud’s “historical” vs. “material” truth: one based on facts in real archive, the other discernible in symptoms [Yerushalmi neglects the latter]
FWT.linkedContent: [re: murder of the father] Freud’s “historical” vs. “material” truth: one based on facts in real archive, the other discernible in symptoms [Yerushalmi neglects the latter]

POOF.content: Freud: Empedocles’ philía and neikos are same (in name & function) as our Eros (combine) and destructiveness (dissolve)
POOF.linkedContent: Freud: Empedocles’ philía and neikos are same (in name & function) as our Eros (combine) and destructiveness (dissolve)

POOF.content: Freud loves to tell Schopenhauerian fable of porcupines who, hoping to stay warm, stop cuddling because their quills hurt them: find mean distance btwn attraction/repulsion
POOF.linkedContent: Freud loves to tell Schopenhauerian fable of porcupines who, hoping to stay warm, stop cuddling because their quills hurt them: find mean distance btwn attraction/repulsion

ROP.content: Derrida, playing w/ huis, huis clos, l’aujourd’hui, describes Freud as door(keeper), standing guard, ushering in > does and does not belong to series in which Foucault inscribes him > hors-série [Copjec]
ROP.linkedContent: Derrida, playing w/ huis, huis clos, l’aujourd’hui, describes Freud as door(keeper), standing guard, ushering in > does and does not belong to series in which Foucault inscribes him > hors-série [Copjec]

ATIA.content: in SW, Derrida analyzed how pubic fleece led Freud into fatality of theoretical delirium
ATIA.linkedContent: in SW, Derrida analyzed how pubic fleece led Freud into fatality of theoretical delirium

DIF.content: before Heidegger purposely and radically questioned presence, Freud & Nietzsche did so, and, remarkably, they did so via motif of differance [remarkable :)]
DIF.linkedContent: before Heidegger purposely and radically questioned presence, Freud & Nietzsche did so, and, remarkably, they did so via motif of differance [remarkable :)]

DIF.content: Spur and Bahnung in Freud: inseparable from differance, no breach w/out difference, no difference w/out trace: movement of trace, in Freud, a protection, deferring danger by constituting a reserve (Vorrat) > each of Freud’s concepts a detour in economy of differance
DIF.linkedContent: Spur and Bahnung in Freud: inseparable from differance, no breach w/out difference, no difference w/out trace: movement of trace, in Freud, a protection, deferring danger by constituting a reserve (Vorrat) > each of Freud’s concepts a detour in economy of differance

DPi.content: sadism/masochism [cf. p. 168] > which is originary in Freud?; (Bemächtigung, Bewältigung—to dominate): cells sent to death, sacrificed, so that it, the state, can survive
DPi.linkedContent: sadism/masochism [cf. p. 168] > which is originary in Freud?; (Bemächtigung, Bewältigung—to dominate): cells sent to death, sacrificed, so that it, the state, can survive

O.content: Derrida not disputing la raison elle-même, the one (masculine) libido—“why not?” [cf. ROP p. 63] > to stand on head [call for feminine libido?] would put back/leave in place truth of phallocentric dialectic
O.linkedContent: Derrida not disputing la raison elle-même, the one (masculine) libido—“why not?” [cf. ROP p. 63] > to stand on head [call for feminine libido?] would put back/leave in place truth of phallocentric dialectic

PSSS.content: “Why War (Warum Krieg)?” letters btwn Freud & Einstein, frontiers btwn phusis and psyche not well-defined: Einstein anticipates Freud (who is disillusioned)
PSSS.linkedContent: “Why War (Warum Krieg)?” letters btwn Freud & Einstein, frontiers btwn phusis and psyche not well-defined: Einstein anticipates Freud (who is disillusioned)

PSSS.content: Freud didn’t like America because he couldn’t stomach the food
PSSS.linkedContent: Freud didn’t like America because he couldn’t stomach the food

PSSS.content: Freud to Jung: I am Moses, you are Joshua
PSSS.linkedContent: Freud to Jung: I am Moses, you are Joshua

PSSS.content: these revenants must haunt our debates [Joshua Jung, Moses Freud] > cruel destiny of a proper name
PSSS.linkedContent: these revenants must haunt our debates [Joshua Jung, Moses Freud] > cruel destiny of a proper name

PSSS.content: psychoanalysis only “science” that intrinsically involves the proper name of its founder, a transferential filiation it claims to be able to analyze
PSSS.linkedContent: psychoanalysis only “science” that intrinsically involves the proper name of its founder, a transferential filiation it claims to be able to analyze

PSSS.content: Freud on indirect methods to combat war, ruse of detour (Umweg)
PSSS.linkedContent: Freud on indirect methods to combat war, ruse of detour (Umweg)

PSSS.content: Freud advocates submitting life of drives to Diktatur der Vernunft, a Utopia > indirect stratagem of Eros/Thanatos: contrary to the cruelty drive, though cruelty knows no end
PSSS.linkedContent: Freud advocates submitting life of drives to Diktatur der Vernunft, a Utopia > indirect stratagem of Eros/Thanatos: contrary to the cruelty drive, though cruelty knows no end

PSSS.content: Freud’s indirection, oblique, angular, mediating nonstraightness: not just detour, strategic ruse, continuous transaction—but a leap, interruption, an ethical step
PSSS.linkedContent: Freud’s indirection, oblique, angular, mediating nonstraightness: not just detour, strategic ruse, continuous transaction—but a leap, interruption, an ethical step

BSi.content: Deleuze accuses psychoanalysis (Freud) of dispossessing (brutalizing w/ machines of war) the Wolf Man (much like Artaud’s complaint about theft of his proper name)
BSi.linkedContent: Deleuze accuses psychoanalysis (Freud) of dispossessing (brutalizing w/ machines of war) the Wolf Man (much like Artaud’s complaint about theft of his proper name)

SPEC.content: performance of psychoanalytic theory: “in the theory of psychoanalysis…” [compare to Rousseau’s Confessions: singular performance] > Freud gave his coup d’envoi, his singular certification: Freud seems to contract only w/ himself
SPEC.linkedContent: performance of psychoanalytic theory: “in the theory of psychoanalysis…” [compare to Rousseau’s Confessions: singular performance] > Freud gave his coup d’envoi, his singular certification: Freud seems to contract only w/ himself

SPEC.content: does Freud want survival of psychoanalysis in his name? does its structure require it?
SPEC.linkedContent: does Freud want survival of psychoanalysis in his name? does its structure require it?

SPEC.content: desire & throw of the dice beyond PP is Freud’s pleasure
SPEC.linkedContent: desire & throw of the dice beyond PP is Freud’s pleasure

SPEC.content: Freud’s signature in form of “if I wish to,” a seal, “auto-critique” w/out pity > what more to say after that? [cf. SW after Derrida, nobody can discover something behind veil]
SPEC.linkedContent: Freud’s signature in form of “if I wish to,” a seal, “auto-critique” w/out pity > what more to say after that? [cf. SW after Derrida, nobody can discover something behind veil]

SPEC.content: transference, ersatz, prosthesis, at the mouth, Freud’s surgeries, cigar: les pas de plus et les plus de pas [?]
SPEC.linkedContent: transference, ersatz, prosthesis, at the mouth, Freud’s surgeries, cigar: les pas de plus et les plus de pas [?]

FV.content: Freud pays no attention to a fold in the text [Emperor’s…], literary narrative is a secondary elaboration, thus an Einkleidung > since Andersens’ text has the text as its theme, it puts Freud’s text [interpretation] onstage
FV.linkedContent: Freud pays no attention to a fold in the text [Emperor’s…], literary narrative is a secondary elaboration, thus an Einkleidung > since Andersens’ text has the text as its theme, it puts Freud’s text [interpretation] onstage

FV.content: Freud’s discourse: no more fiction than science
[Lacan on properly inheriting, following the letter of Freud]
FV.linkedContent: [Lacan on properly inheriting, following the letter of Freud]

FV.content: dead king, Freud, only one to contract w/ himself, awaits restitution > restoration: carrying off last plume w/ his 1st hand [in dying, mobilizes many]: theory of the facteurs
FV.linkedContent: dead king, Freud, only one to contract w/ himself, awaits restitution > restoration: carrying off last plume w/ his 1st hand [in dying, mobilizes many]: theory of the facteurs

FV.content: in Phaedrus, logos is its own father, answers for itself [re: Lacan’s relation to Freud’s text]
FV.linkedContent: in Phaedrus, logos is its own father, answers for itself [re: Lacan’s relation to Freud’s text]

FV.content: by way of Lacan, Freud tells us very literally Heidegger’s What is Metaphysics?
FV.linkedContent: by way of Lacan, Freud tells us very literally Heidegger’s What is Metaphysics?
